name: Clock Busters
description:
Uncover the secrets of a castle throughout time as you try to stop the Time Lord from destroying the natural flow of time as you fight your way through a metroidvania built around a randomizer.

This demo is the result of 5 game design students over a semester.  It includes a mostly complete vertical slice of our vision, including:

  • 2 classes to choose from at the start.
  • 2 different time periods to explore.
  • A randomizer for upgrades to ensure no two games are the same.
  • A variety of upgrades, including 5 unlockable abelites.
  • A toggleable life system to encourage making use of the randomization.
  • A boss to prove your skill against.

Controls:

Movement: Arrow Key
Jump: Z
Attack: X
Pause: P/Tab/Esc
Interact: S
